backend/main.mo: Main actor defining booking management system with functions to submit, retrieve, and update booking status, storing bookings in a Map with auto-incrementing IDs.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old booking records without status field to new booking records with a default 'pending' status.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented admin dashboard features with high confidence, including table display, status tracking, routing, and React Query integration.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend component files describing their purpose, functionality, and styling approach.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes with navy and gold color scheme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Servexa website with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application root using TanStack Router to define routes for home page and admin dashboard with shared layout containing header and navy gradient background.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard component displaying all bookings in a responsive table with status badges, dropdown menus for status updates, loading/error states, and glassmorphism styling.
frontend/src/components/BeforeAfterGalle: Gallery component displaying before/after service images in a grid layout with glassmorphism cards and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/BookingForm.tsx: A React form component for booking home services that collects customer name, phone, service category, and address, then submits via a mutation hook and displays a success message.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Displays contact information including three phone numbers, a WhatsApp button, physical address in Kolkata, and Instagram social link in a two-column grid layout.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: Renders an accordion-style FAQ section with six common questions about service areas, pricing, warranties, and technician certifications.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: A fixed-position floating button in the bottom-right corner that opens WhatsApp chat with a pre-filled message when clicked.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright information and a 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed header with Servexa logo and a 'Call Now' button that initiates a phone call when clicked.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with background image, headline text, CTA buttons for calling/WhatsApp, and three trust badge cards highlighting service features.
frontend/src/components/ServiceAreas.tsx: Displays the two service areas (Kolkata and Howrah) in a simple two-column grid with map pin icons.
Three-column grid showcasing service categories (Home Appliance Repair, Plumbing, Electrical) with icons and bulleted lists of specific services offered.
frontend/src/components/StickyCallBar.ts: Mobile-only sticky bottom bar with a prominent call button displaying the primary phone number, visible only on small screens.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialSlide: A React component that displays customer testimonials in an auto-rotating carousel with manual navigation controls, showing ratings, names, services, and feedback text.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUs.tsx: A React component that displays a grid of five key benefits/features of the Servexa service, each with an icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A custom React hook that manages the ICP backend actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: A custom React hook and context provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Custom React Query hooks for booking operations including submitting bookings, fetching all bookings, and updating booking status via the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining Tailwind configuration, custom CSS variables for navy/gold color scheme, glass morphism effects, and shadow utilities for the Servexa brand.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom navy/gold colors using OKLCH color space, Poppins font family, custom border radii, and shadow utilities.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a modern home services website for Servexa Pvt Ltd with urban luxury design, mobile-first responsive layout, and SEO optimization. Contains 10 implemented features including hero section, services cards, contact section, floating CTAs, footer, and performance optimizations.
